website_summaries.verdict: Feel better about your smile and your teeth after a few applications of this product.
pros: Whitening portion of the kit only takes 20 minutes
Follow-up recovery gel takes an additional 10 minutes
Comes with remineralization gel in case product makes your teeth sensitive
cons: Included mouth trays are a little hard to mold to teeth
Bulky compared to average whitening strips

customer_reviews.title: Best Whitening Product. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product every other day for 3 weeks and my smile is much brighter! My teeth went to a dull yellow color to a bright white color fast! Although my bottom incisors are still yellow, i am confident they will continue to whiten a couple shades until my kit is gone. In the past I've used whitening strips and it was a failure. Thanks Active Wow for my new pearly white smile :D .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I was a bit hesitant to use this because I have very sensitive teeth and was worried this would make it worse. After using the whitening gel, my teeth do feel a bit more sensitive but the blue gel fixes the problem completely. I've done two session so far and the results have been amazing. This kit is definitely the most effective whitening kit I've tried. Definitely has a great price point. Edit - this product is very harsh on the gums. Whatever you do don't get it on your gums.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Burns! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. I followed directions as written. The product burnt my gums and I had white boils on it. It was painful not even a minute into the application. I would give it a 0 star if I could. I took the picture the moment the boils started to show. It hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Aixa A.O.

customer_reviews.title: As a dental assistant, this is the best product I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have worked as a dental assistant for several years. I absolutely LOVE this product. I used the whitener for the full 20 mins, followed by the remineralizer for 40 mins. ZERO sensitivity, which I’ve not found in any product, even using fluoride after. I do use my own professional bleach trays along with the light so I’m not sure about the molds. But I will definitely be reordering refills and have already told several friends about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme113w

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the super expensive kits you get from the dentist!
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, no sensitivity issues
customer_reviews.text: I have definitely noticed a whiter smile. I used a similar kit a few years ago that did not include the light or remineralization gel. I think this one has whitened faster and has had less (no) sensitivity. I don't love the mouth piece, but it seems to work OK. The one I previously had definitely fit better after being molded.
customer_reviews.author: buckeye09

customer_reviews.title: Did not work...buy Colgate!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work at all! Do not waste your money. It also does not say anywhere in the directions when you can use it again. I have used a few things and the best thing I have found that works quickly is colgate whitening toothpaste with the mouth rinse, works in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty white teeth
customer_reviews.text: This teeth whitening kit works really well. I've used it for a week, but I noticed a difference after the first use. I have pretty white teeth, but I wanted this for the space in between my teeth, and it's been great. I love the extra whiteness I get after each use! I have super sensitive teeth normally, but I had no pain at all after using this for 20 minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina gowette

customer_reviews.title: A vegetarian version is needed...
customer_reviews.text: Very professional. I will give it 5 stars if it is available in a vegetarian/vegan formulation. The ingredients include kosher gelatin so I am suspicious it is not a vegetarian gelatin. Please make a vegetarian version. I recommend using these kits one time per week for four weeks, 20 minutes whitener, 1 hour remineralization gel. Then after 4 treatments (1 month.,) take a break for three months before repeating if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sands

customer_reviews.title: Extra Trays are a Problem
customer_reviews.text: If you need more trays, this is what Customer Service will tell you "You can buy either the starter kit or the premium kit for more trays. They are not sold separately. Thanks, Customer Support"
customer_reviews.author: Bruce R. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice now and noticed whiter teeth after my first use. I haven't had any sensitivity but still use the resurfacing gel as directed. Kit is a very nice and inexpensive alternative to going to the dentist for whitening treatments.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK _ Update
customer_reviews.text: Update: The seller gave me a refund of this product. I changed my one star to three because of their customer service. This product does not work. I was hoping for some difference before I finished the whole kit, but NO. I finished using this product but there was no whitening done. Waste of time & money. Go buy some other product
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good whitener horrible molds.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a big difference from only one use, I drink a lot of coffee and tea and I have had my teeth professionally whitened before so I know what I want to achieve.... worked good except the trays are HORRIBLE to use and hard to mold and I’ve been using molds for my teeth for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: No sensitivity and easy use
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous for the sensitivity that a lot of whitening kits cause in teeth so I was scared to try this product out. It was mt first whitening kit and I don't notice any sensitivity! It's not a dramatic difference after the first use but I do notice a difference! The instructions were clear and was easy to use, I'm glad I can finally get these coffee stains off!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: worth a shot
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other whitening products so I get curious and hesitate to try another product but after seeing ActiveWow Whitening Kit, I thought I would give it a try. It seems easy so was excited to try after receiving if it works. Wow! I can't believe how easy to set it up as long as you follow directions. It actually made difference and if only this is permanent though. I love how non-messy and no hassle the kit is which is perfect for on the go for work, travel or everyday routine plus mint flavor smells refreshing. I'd recommend to try it out if you want fast, easy and painless teeth whitening.
customer_reviews.author: Trendsavyreview

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I eat a lot of berries, so I needed something to help with the stains they leave on my teeth. This filled the bill, and I didn't notice any sensitivity with the use of the remineralization gel that comes with the kit. Believe me, I went to the dentist to have my teeth cleaned right after using the kit, and with the cold water they spray in your mouth, I would definitely know if there was any sensitivity there. I like it. They also send you a free item after your purchase. They ask you to leave a review in return for the item, but I would have left a review anyway, so it is a win-win, I think.
customer_reviews.author: The Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Tried today and I have to agree with the other user. I tried to mold the trays but they were just to big even after cutting them. I tried it anyway but like her my mouth was filling up with spit and I was getting an upset stomach because I was swallowing some of it. I may try again another day because I really want it to work but today was a mess!! I will probably end up going to the white strips. I thought for the price I’d give this a try but didn’t go as I had hoped. Can’t tell if it actually whitens. I couldn’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bullard

customer_reviews.title: The LED Device does not work / will not turn on
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was very excited to try this product because it has the LED Device to accelerate the whitening gel. I've tried many other teeth whitening products and this one seemed different. The LED Device is what makes this product different from all others and the reason why I purchased it. After reading the instructions, I followed all directions, turned the device on, and nothing! No blue light. It doesn't work. This was extremely disappointing. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Good value but not great
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but it arrived with only 1 tray. Not happy. Updated: I found the other trays. They were inside the tray case! Duh! Changed my rating as well. Only 4 stars as the product isn’t working as effectively as I had hoped. I definitely see good progress but it has taken quite a few weeks (applying 1-2 times each week) to get noticeable results. Still happy with my purchase though!
customer_reviews.author: MaxwellFam

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think I really wanted to take the effort for this kit since you have to put the light in your mouth but it is really easy. I didn't have to use the blue tubes ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it does work! I didn't think I really wanted to take the effort for this kit since you have to put the light in your mouth but it is really easy. I didn't have to use the blue tubes which are for sensitivity.... I had NO sensitivity but.... I have much whiter teeth. Even the crowns are whiter and brighter. Good product, good results. Oh, you can tell after the first use that it is working. I have only used one of the tubes that you receive and I think I am done. I will be using the second tube for touch ups....
customer_reviews.author: jackie carvajal

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it enough yet to comment on the whitening ability, but I will make sure to update this review and add pictures after I see (or don’t) results. I can say that this product is easy to use and setup and gave me absolutely no sensitivity at all. The flavor is good, and if you follow the directions, the initial learning process is a breeze! For the price, this product is a NO BRAINER!
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: This is okay
customer_reviews.text: Now I do not use this every day or every week, maybe like 2or 3 times a month. I think if I used it more it would work.. only problem is when it is in my mouth, my mouth feels up with spit and by the end I am almost gagging trying to get the stuff out. (such an awkward review lol). My wedding is coming up in 38 days so I am going to use it extra and I will post a picture later.
customer_reviews.author: Shandi Hunsinger

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the middle of this right now but notice a difference. They send 3 molds - and I can see why. It was hard to make them. if your water is not hot enough, you can't form it correctly. If your water is too hot, the thing folds over on itself and you end up with a gummy mess. Not sure my trays fit right but I can see whitening happening. How can you go wrong when it says on the label "Fast AF Whitening" FaSt As F#*! Whitening
customer_reviews.author: Marzy K.

customer_reviews.title: so Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: the box includes the whitening gels enough for 30 treatements, the LED light, teeth trays and the tray container. It also has two tips for precise gel spreading. The gel has minty taste and thus feels refreshing. It is easy to use and works well. The LED lights enhance the effect of whitening gel and only requires 15-20 minutes after applying the gels. A convenient set instead of going to dentist for people with busy lives!
customer_reviews.author: Sheng-chieh Chang

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective for Me
customer_reviews.text: I have used it three times at 20 mins per treatment; however, I'm not seeing much result. My teeth weren't very discolored to begin with, just mild discoloration from coffee and wine. I expected improvement after 3 treatments. It is very easy to use, tastes great and I have experienced no sensitivity from using it. I wish it worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Stover

customer_reviews.title: need extra tray as given trays as cant use it
customer_reviews.text: per instruction, put trays in hot water for 10 secs only, but it got di-shaped right away and cant fix it, even before putting in mouth. so cant use the product. u guys should provide few extra.
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions. Easy to use. Hope this really works.
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived in less than 2 days. I was excited to try this product so opened it immediately, read the instructions and proceeded to “mold” the mouth trays. After a couple of try’s/adjustments I achieved what I thought was the correct fit. I applied the gl to teeth as instructed using a cotton swab. Inserted trays, then the light. Easy. Waited the 10 suggested minutes. (Lots of drooling occurred but I just used tissues to wipe it up). Removed light, trays, rinsed with water. I didn’t see immediate results but I’ll try again in a couple of days. Anxious to see if this really works. I’m optimistically hopeful! I’ll update review after a week or so of using product.
customer_reviews.author: Silverone

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you don’t get absolutely any on the gums. Will burn and get red. I didn’t notice hot water to do anything to mold the trays. They look the same to me. I’ve used it twice and now the light doesn’t work. I didn’t leave it on. Also, I’m not sure if I’m doing something wrong but the two times I did it, it seems to be very messy. I guess I’ll buy a new battery and try again. Also, I didn’t get the remineralization stuff. It only came with 3 clear whitening serums.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: I love how this came with everything! I'm still in the process of using it so, once I'm done, I'll come back and update the review. So far, I love the LED light. Makes everything so much faster. Before this kit, I had the whitening strips from another brand and it suggested 30 mins to an 1 hr. Without the LED light, I had it in for an hour. Now, only 30 minutes! Love it! Do keep in mind, your teeth can/will get a little sensitive esp. the gum area.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: I had Zoom whitening and used this kit with my leftover gel. Just like with professional whitening, the key is to dry your teeth before applying gel, you may need gauze under your lips to keep saliva out. It worked great! It’s not too heavy, and as a large/tall person with a large skull, I got good coverage on my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Myers Mccullough

customer_reviews.title: SENT ME A USED PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a chance to try this product because it came USED!!! The white plastic bag inside the box with slit open which was my first indicator that this had been used. Upon further inspection I noticed that the whitening tray had been used! So incredibly disgusting! Returned immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it takes patience
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product daily for about a week. I didn't start to notice any difference until about five days in. I was figuring it was a complete waste of $40. But I can actually tell that my teeth are slightly whiter than they were a week ago. I'm not trying to get the bright super white teeth, but I am hoping that over the next couple weeks I am able to whiten my teeth at least a few shades. I would be totally happy with that! But as of now, I am pleased where this is going. Can't wait to see where I am in a couple more weeks!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bolle

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Being an espresso drink or I was looking for a teeth whitening kit that would not break the bank but yet still do a good job. I’ve used other active wow products in the past and been happy with the results so I figured I would give this one a try. Just like the other reviews, I begin to see results very quickly. I am happy with the product and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are like super super yellow but they are not completely white so I decided to try this because it was affordable and it looks promising and honestly it really did it’s job like my teeth like a couple shades lighter I’m still not through the full process but I love what I’m say my teeth are like super super yellow but they are not completely white so I decided to try this because it was affordable and it looks promising and honestly it really did it’s job like my teeth look a couple shades lighter I’m still not through the full process but I love what I’m seeing.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Angel

customer_reviews.title: Stained my teeth
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product after a thorough cleaning at my dentist. After a week of usage I noticed my teeth developing yellow stains that hadn’t been there prior. I discontinued use & am just using a whitening toothpaste. Thank goodness the toothpaste is getting rid of the yellow staining. I would not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E. Stefanka

customer_reviews.title: If you're on the fence, let this review convince you to buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing stuff! Definitely the best product I've used, and the biggest reason for that is that their mouth pieces are ones you can actually form. Plus, you really can tell a difference once you use it the first time, and you'll need to use that remineralization stuff after. Quality, effective, doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a week and a half now and can tell a difference in my teeth already. I think it will continue to make them whiter. There is also so much of this product so it will last me a long time. I was worried about sensitivity but I have no issues with that at all so far. Cant wait to see the end result
customer_reviews.author: bicgin

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Probably best to read the instructions thoroughly first though - they’re quick and easy! I read as I went and when you’re doing the molding trays you have to be quick since they’re warm and molding. Thankfully there was an extra tray since I messed up (user error). Instructions are to the point! Easy to follow and just enough of everything you need. I have never used an at home whitening kit so I was a little intimidated. I’ve only used it once so far but plan to try 2-3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s so easy to use with step by step instructions. I use it while I’m wearing a face mask, doing my hair or reading. It arrived super fast and glad for the three mouth trays because my teeth are crooked both top and bottom and some whitening strips are difficult to get in all the nooks. These mouth trays can be formed to my teeth though which leaves me with a more even white smile.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Chase

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get the molds to form
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product! I don't have very straight teeth and I just could not get the molds to form. I tried and retried but no luck. I put the gel on and used the molds as they were and used the LED light. It was very uncomfortable that way and had no effect as far as whitening goes. I will try the molds again and hopefully have better results
customer_reviews.author: MD2083

customer_reviews.title: Whiter teeth the first time
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and use! Results after the first time and only 10 minutes of use. I wanted to check sensitivities first and didn’t have any problems. Noticeable difference really made me so happy. 3 moldable trays are easy to do. Place in hot water for a couple of seconds, shake off, bite down and it takes your teeth imprint. Apply formula to teeth and set timer. Enjoy results.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie  Kakachyan

customer_reviews.title: Nothing negative to say! Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use!! Just follow the simple directions and use 2-3 times a week! I’ve only used it twice! The taste doesn’t bother me at all and I’m so surprised that it doesn’t bother my gums! I have very sensitive teeth and gums and this works great so far! No concerns at all!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Stalans

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Results
customer_reviews.text: Literally anytime I have used the teeth whitening kit the next day someone mentions how white my teeth are.. and that’s just one day of using it. I have purchased this for myself as well as a gift. Great product. When molding the retainers to your teeth you should put it in very hot water. I did not do it accurately the first time but they give an extra retainer which is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best teeth whitening kit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I decided to purchase this! My teeth are over 50% whiter after just one use. I struggle with having very sensitive teeth, and this did not bother me. I really love the de sensitizing gel, and it truly works. I would say I have about 25-30 applications with the syringes provided. You really only use a teeny tiny amount of each tube. Totally worth the money and I love this kit way more than the crest white strips I previously used for years. If you’re on the fence, I recommend purchasing! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable whitening by the third use.
customer_reviews.text: Only two small cons: 1. It will burn your gums while you're using it. Burning goes away right after you rinse. 2. button on the light emitter is a little too sensitive. Be careful or you may turn it off without noticing while whitening.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Whitens quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used 6 days and I can already see a big difference! My teeth are already a few shades whiter than they were. It is more cumbersome and less comfortable than whitening strips, but it’s worth the extra time and effort. I was concerned after reading some of the reviews about sensitivity and gum blisters, but I haven’t had that experience myself. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque M

customer_reviews.title: Have noticed a difference
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this consistently, like 2x week or anything, but I've used it off and on since my purchase and I have definitely noticed whitening. My teeth are generally sensitive to cold, but haven't noticed this to cause any additional sensitives like traditional white strips have for me in past. Will re-order when I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: sarahr

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: Not as instant results as some would have you believe, but after 4 uses and good brushing each day since starting I think I'm seeing moderate results. Will continue with product. Huge Plus: The extra mouth piece is fantastic to do. I definitely dropped my first one by accidentally touching the hot water in my cup and it was ruined. Thank goodness there was a spare
customer_reviews.author: Caed Frost

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I already used it 4 times, and I can barely see any difference! Last time I kept it on for 1 hour! Same result! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I haven't used teeth whitening products in years. I was a die-hard Crest strip girl. This product is pretty amazing. I will update my review because I'm only on day 3. The taste isn't bad and it is simple to use. I can already see a difference. I am so excited to see the end results. Thank you Active Wow!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Whiter teeth.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do, my teeth were noticeably whiter to people around me, I didn't notice myself but had everyone commenting how white my teeth were. Rivals the professional whitening treatments that a dentist would provide, at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rennison

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all I’ve been using this for a couple weeks now and I am noticing some whitening of my teeth it is pretty easy to use I don’t love they had to keep it in for a half hour but that being said if it whitens my teeth in the end since I do have stains because I’m such a heavy coffee drinker than it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works great
customer_reviews.text: My son had horribly coffee stained teeth and has resisted using most whitening products fearing that they would wear away enamel. He was please to see that this one provides remineralization and was happy to use it. He now has a gorgeous smile again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for well over a month and I see no difference, only even more sensitive teeth. I’ve tried decreasing time using it, the amount, and even used the desensitizing gel. Total waste of my money and now I’m in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Whitens well
customer_reviews.text: This product does whiten the more you use it, the mouth pieces mold easy and the ultra violet light is nice. It takes a few whitening sessions to start seeing noticeable results but it does the job at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul lasuer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete package
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed because when my package arrived one of the syringes was missing the cap, and the light does not work dispite having batteries....kind of makes me feel like someone had this before, then it was just shrink wrapped in plastic after being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Luffman

customer_reviews.title: High quality, fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Much better results than I had expected prior to purchasing! Used 4 times and trust me, this whitening molded led kit is of high quality at an expectativas price. Started with 5 mins and Increased until suggested time was reached. Very simple and great product!
customer_reviews.author: B Sand

customer_reviews.title: didn't work
customer_reviews.text: very uncomfortable to wear and did not see any results. don't buy. would recommend opalescence whitening gel instead.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Almost no sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I have a difficult time whitening my teeth because of tooth sensitivity. I bought this because of the remineralization tubes. I barely had any sensitivity afterwards, and none the next day! That never happens, usually the next day is worse.
customer_reviews.author: charity carter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing teeth whitening kit! Wife approved!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing teeth whitening kit. I ordered this for my wife as she wanted to spend $300 at the dentist. The results are amazing and highly recommend. I have bonded teeth so this would not change the color of those teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Good teeth whitening kit!
customer_reviews.text: This teeth whitening kit is super easy to use. I have sensitive teeth so most kits hurt my tooth nerves. This kit does not sting my roots and after 1 week there was considerable difference in the shade of my teeth!
customer_reviews.author: IvynSimon

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and it works
customer_reviews.text: Used it 2x and I see the difference. I drink coffee and tea everyday and I have bleached my teeth at the dentist office in the past but this is better priced and I can do it at the comfort of my home at any time. I even bought my husband the kit since it really works. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: My teeth are white AF! 😃
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I didn’t even realize how tinted my had gotten over the years! Active wow is super easy to use and the mouth trays makes it easy to relax your mouth during the process. I didn’t have any sensitivity using this product! I will definitely continue using this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: The Scott Squad

customer_reviews.title: Burned skin inside mouth
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed. Rinced well, made sure all gel was washed out several times. Used restoring gel after. Did not notice burning or any sensation at all while whitening. Burning started later and got worse as day went on. 1.5" burn under tooth line and on soft tissue of lower jaw/mouth. Would not recommend use.
customer_reviews.author: rochelle

customer_reviews.title: After about 5 days of use I started to see a some color change in my teeth
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about 5 days now, I have definitely see some color change in my teeth. It is simple to use. My husband wants to order another one for him. Comes with 30 days of whitening gel.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Best teeth whitening system by far
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best teeth whitening product that I have ever used. I brush the solution on my teeth, connect the tray to the charge port on my phone, watch a 30 minute program while the whitening takes place then brush and rinse. I'm done.... What a noticable improvement after 3 applications....Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wilmot

customer_reviews.title: No change...
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopeful based on the solid positive reviews, but I found the peroxide to be weak and the whole thing just messy. I don't see anything special about this product. Ive used it everyday for 20 mins the last 5 days and not much difference. I will most likely try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Just one use!
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable difference after first use. Usually stick to strips but decided to try this. I actually put a little dot on each tooth then put inside mouth guard. Much easier then trying to keep on teeth! 15 minutes and I saw a difference with no teeth sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Tenaya Ellis

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly surprised by the results of this product. It actually works. I saw a difference after just a couple of sessions. It’s easy to use and a lot cheaper than a lot of the other products out there!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Molds were fairly easy to make
customer_reviews.text: Molds were fairly easy to make, they even include a third mold in case you mess up, which I did so that came in handy because I found the lower jaw to be harder to get a good mold versus the upper jaw. It comes with everything pictured, I'll try to update as I go through whitening sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Get whiter teeth 🦷
customer_reviews.text: Great for whitening teeth, gave to a gift for my brother and he now swears by this. I helped him forming the guards to his mouth and it was a very simple process. The instructions are very easy and well detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Flota

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the 1st time today, I had it in for 10 minutes and was impressed with what it did in that short amount of time. The directions are clear and easy to follow, it tastes fresh and my mouth feels clean after using it. My only advice would be is to try and keep it away from the gums because it will burn a little. That's kind of common sense in my opinion :)
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Fillings*
customer_reviews.text: I got these in hopes of whitening my teeth and I was not satisfied with the results. I used this for about a month and saw little difference in the color of my teeth. The positive review is that it is fairly easy to use and you do get lots of product. It doesn't taste good, but it's not completely unbearable either. I wouldn't recommend this product, but maybe you will have better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive alternative to pro whitening.
customer_reviews.text: Works! Had a chat with my dentist and this is essentially what he’ll charge you 200$ for.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than I expected. You dip the trays in hot water to form them to your teeth. Come with an extra tray as well. You need very little whitening gel at a time so it's good for a lot of uses. The included remineralization gel does a lot to help with sensitivity as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Reis

customer_reviews.title: Moderately effective
customer_reviews.text: The gel seems to slightly whiten with continuous use, but don't expect over the top results. Great customer service on resolving issues. The instructions are not clear but if you're supposed to use the light at the same time as the bulky teeth molds then there isn't enough room in a normal sized mouth for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Splotchy whitening
customer_reviews.text: I do like the trays that it comes with, easy to form. However the whitening formula doesn’t seem to work for me. It leaves splotches of white patches on my teeth. I do not get even whitening beware
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Light did not work - was unable to use
customer_reviews.text: i would love to leave a review but the light did not work upon receiving the product. I followed all the instructions and removed the film before inserting the batteries but the light did not work at all - i even purchased new batteries thinking the ones that came with it were old. I was very excited to use this especially after reading the reviews. I reached out to customer service but never received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Gina B

customer_reviews.title: Fun and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I think this kit is really fun! I loved making my mold and then using it is super easy! I feel like after the second use I was able to see good results and I’m very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Monica F.

customer_reviews.title: happy and waiting to see the final results
customer_reviews.text: I started my first set last night. And i have to say that just in general the fact that the solution does not irritate my guns is a major plus. I was Ok with the taste of the solution as well...happy and waiting to see the final results.will post pictures
customer_reviews.author: veronica lira

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap low-quality
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst product I have ever ordered in my life the lowest and cheapest quality I have ever seen shirt not worth $40 I will definitely return. The blue light won’t even stay on the mouthpieces are disgusting
customer_reviews.author: Ala

customer_reviews.title: It works but read the instructions carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and simple to use. Worked great for me! I drink a lot of acidic drinks and food SOME HELPFUL TIPS: . I wouldn't let the water be a full boil. Put some water in the microwave until you see a few bubbles. LET IT REST FOR 1 MINUTE. Then dunk with the extra plastic piece 1 at a time for no more than 10 seconds. .Feel any pain or tingling take them out right away and rinse your mouth . Only use a few times a week it's strong stuff
customer_reviews.author: HANNAHRP

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Pros - visibly whitens, no sensitivity (for me) on either gums or teeth, and lots of product in the case Cons - the diy trays folded in when I used them and didn’t tightly mold to my teeth. This was fine for me because I have a professional retainer that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: light doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: light doesn't work. even bought my own batteries to try and still doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It includes a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just what you would expect and more. The kit is really complete/ you will have everything you need from it. It’s really easy to use and very manageable. No reason to get messy because of the syringes. As for result i will need more time since i just started the treatment so for I think there is a little improvement. Not really sure though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam I.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Results
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal, quick results! I am thrilled with how quickly this worked. Admittedly, it was a little uncomfortable at first, but it really didn't take long to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Boo
customer_reviews.text: I felt as though it didn’t do better than simple baking soda and tooth paste. Would not buy again. It was super uncomfortable and annoying with very little results.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Noticed a change after just the second use!!! Do be careful when molding the mouth guard though. I think I bit too hard? But either way this product works great!
customer_reviews.author: HJen3

customer_reviews.title: Great whitener
customer_reviews.text: Great whitener without having to get from dentist. I found the trays to be hard to mold to fit and luckily I had trays from previous dentist provided whitener. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: M J Morris

customer_reviews.title: PAINFUL and cumbersome to use.
customer_reviews.text: This was so painful, I couldn't even use it for half the suggested time. Has a lot of parts to work with too. I'd go for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Instant Results but isshhhh quality
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid coffee drinker and after ten minutes with this stuff, I got amazing results. After two more uses, my light stopped working which I thought was a little ridiculous since I always turned it off after every use. I changed the batteries but it won't turn on anymore. Maybe it's not meant to be used more than three times? In any case I'm ordering a new light to continue using the solution since my chiclets are finally a popping pearly white thanks to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grace A

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me at all. Saw no ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me at all. Saw no difference in appearance of teeth. :( Edit to add: I am getting a full refund. Thank you active wow for really caring about your customers.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I haven’t been super consistent with doing the whitening but I have already been asked multiple time what I whiten them with! Results after just 2-3 uses, yay! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Green solution and defective light
customer_reviews.text: I can't try the product because the blue light flickers and won't stay on. It is broken. On top of that, like other people have said, the solution is GREEN and not BLUE. Is this ok? Is it safe to use? The directions say to open the blue tube, so it's kind of worrisome when it's green. Especially when we are using a product on our teeth and no one wants to take a chance with that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Trempe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use, whitening power doesn’t seem to be working. Unsure if Because a lot of my enamel has worn away or if the whitening gel just takes longer in some people’s teeth. Will continue to try it until product is all out. Hoping to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Alex/Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Good teeth whitening gel. I could tell a difference in how white my teeth were after using just a few times. I had a bit of trouble molding the trays to my teeth. That takes a bit of trial and error at least for me. You get 3 trays in case you mess one up but it would be nice if there were 4 instead.
customer_reviews.author: TLV

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, the flavor was good but of course I don’t think my teeth are white enough. It was very easy to use, and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Rovelli

customer_reviews.title: better products out there
customer_reviews.text: Not best whitening tool out there. For how long it takes to get everything ready and set up you might as well just do strips
customer_reviews.author: Natashia N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s really easy to use. I was a cigarette smoker for years and a daily coffee drinker. And so far I do see a difference so I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: I will no longer be self conscious about smiling!
customer_reviews.text: As a single mom, I depend on coffee to get me through the day, but I've always been very self conscious about the color of my teeth. Teeth whitening at a dental office isn't an expense that I can afford either, so I was excited to try this affordable whitening treatment. All I can say is, if you're unhappy with the color of your teeth, THIS IS YOUR PRODUCT! My teeth were two shades white after my first treatment, and I only used it for 10min!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Poe

product_meta.title: Active Wow Teeth Whitening Kit - LED Light, 36% Carbamide Peroxide, Mint - (3) 5ml Gel Syringes, Tray and Case
feature_bullets: Active Wow 24K Premium Teeth Whitening Kit is Fast...💨 AF!
The Carbamide peroxide teeth whitening Kit helps remove surface stains and deep discoloration in your teeth 😬.
Active Wow teeth whitening kit helps eliminate the stains caused by coffee ☕, wine 🍷, and other foods 🍭 .
This teeth whitening kit has everything ✔️ you need. Custome molded trays, LED light, Carbamide Peroxide, Precision tips & Tray case.
Just apply the whitening gel, turn on your light, and chill ❄️. Do it as often as needed.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
